backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling online admissions and inquiries with admin-gated retrieval and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking copy‑link functionality to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend pages, components, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base theme defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry setting metadata, SEO tags, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router configuration defining all site routes wrapped in theme and layout providers.
Component that checks Internet Identity and admin permission before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/admin/CsvExportB: Button component generating CSV downloads for admissions or inquiries.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading state and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/facilities/Facil: Reusable card displaying a facility icon, name, and description.
frontend/src/components/forms/InquiryFor: Form for submitting inquiries with validation, service selection, and async submission via useSubmitInquiry.
frontend/src/components/forms/OnlineAdmi: Online admission form handling personal details, address, package selection, photo upload, and submission via useSubmitAdmission.
frontend/src/components/gallery/Lightbox: Modal lightbox allowing image navigation with keyboard support and UI controls.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroMedia.t: Hero background component showing a looping video with a fallback image on error.
frontend/src/components/layout/CopyLinkB: Button that copies the current page link and displays success or error status icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with about info, quick links, services, and contact details including social icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive site header with navigation links, copy-link button, call-to-action buttons, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper containing header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/membership/Prici: Pricing card displaying plan details, features, and a button to start admission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmissions.ts: Provides React Query hooks to submit admissions and inquiries and fetch all admissions, inquiries, and admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyPageLink.ts: Implements a utility hook to copy the current page URL using clipboard APIs with fallback behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation hook for submitting inquiries through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage authentication, identity loading, and login state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and luxury-themed color variables, typography, and UI effects for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with stats, search, tabs, and tables for managing admissions and inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, phone links, map embeds, and quick-action buttons for calling or messaging the gym.
frontend/src/pages/ExtraPremiumFacilitie: Displays a grid of premium facility cards using predefined data with icons, names, and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a tabbed gallery with category filters, placeholder images, and a lightbox viewer.
frontend/src/pages/GymFacilitiesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of gym facility cards based on a facility list with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides a hero section with navigation buttons and SEO-focused content highlighting gym features.
frontend/src/pages/InquiryPage.tsx: Handles inquiry form submission and displays a success screen with WhatsApp link integration.
frontend/src/pages/MassageTherapyPage.ts: Presents massage and therapy services with descriptions and actions to book or call.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPlansPage.t: Displays individual, couple, and group membership plans using pricing cards and feature lists.
frontend/src/pages/OnlineAdmissionPage.t: Renders the online admission form and shows a success screen after submission with navigation options. Uses state to toggle between form and confirmation view.
Displays restaurant and coffee offerings as cards and includes a placeholder gallery grid. Uses predefined items with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL or session-based parameters. Supports both query and hash routing formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, fonts, and custom gold-themed styles for the luxury UI. Extends base utilities and enables plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature descriptions, requirements tracking, and architectural notes for the site’s development state.
